title: Some Kind of Magic
description: When Claire makes a birthday wish for a little excitement, she gets more than she bargained for. Dylan, a wounded survivor from an airplane wreck, comes crashing into her life, kidnaps her, and demands to be taken to her remote Idaho cabin. Assuming Dylan is an escaped convict, Claire proceeds to handcuff him to the bed. It's a curious beginning to a beautiful romance. As Claire and Dylan express their true feelings, Dylan also reveals his real identity along with other secrets from his mysterious past...
author: Theresa Weir
